title: NewsBreak: Fed Cuts Interest Rates by Quarter Point
text:
NewsBreak: Fed Cuts Interest Rates by Quarter Point

Economy 5 hours ago (Sep 18, 2019 02:14PM ET)

© Reuters. Investing.com - The Federal Open Market Committee lowered its benchmark interest rate by 25 basis points Wednesday. The FOMC to a range of 1.75% to 2% from 2% to 2.25%. The , with one FOMC member calling for a 50 bps cut and two others voting for no change. The market had been pricing in more than a the Fed would cut by a quarter point. The fell 0.5%, compared with a 0.2% loss before the announcement.

NewsBreak: Fed Cuts Interest Rates by Quarter Point
